messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "file_main_product_planning_agenda_2025_12_02",
      "name": "Main Product - Planning Meeting Agenda (Dec 2, 2025)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-24T10:15:00-05:00",
      "content": "Main Product - Planning Meeting
Date: Tuesday, December 2, 2025
Time: 10:00–10:45 AM ET
Location: Zoom (link in calendar invite)
Organizer: Alex Smith
Participants: Alex Smith, Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams

Objectives
- Review current Main Product milestone status
- Prioritize work for the next sprint
- Identify blockers and owners

Proposed Agenda (45 minutes)
1. Quick status check on current milestones (10 min)
2. Review open items for next sprint (15 min)
3. Identify and assign owners for major tasks (10 min)
4. Blockers / risks and mitigation (10 min)

Notes
- Please come prepared with an updated view of your in‑flight work on Main Product.
- We’ll capture decisions in a separate meeting notes doc linked from the calendar event."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_main_product_planning_notes_2025_12_02",
      "name": "Main Product - Planning Meeting Notes - 2025-12-02",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-12-02T11:05:00-05:00",
      "content": "Main Product - Planning Meeting Notes
Date: Tuesday, December 2, 2025
Time: 10:00–10:45 AM ET
Location: Zoom
Attendees: Alex Smith, Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams

1. Current Milestone Status
- Overall status: On track, but tight on API integration timeline.
- Auth refactor: PR #482 nearly ready; pending final tests.

2. Next Sprint Priorities
- Finalize authentication middleware refactor and rollout plan.
- Compact dashboard layout exploration (customer feedback re: card height).
- Performance monitoring improvements on project overview page.

3. Owners
- Auth middleware rollout: Jordan (owner), Sam (review/support).
- Dashboard layout exploration: Jordan to coordinate with Design.
- Monitoring improvements: Sam to draft implementation proposal.

4. Blockers / Risks
- Possible delays if auth rollout uncovers regression issues.
- Limited design bandwidth in early December.

Action Items
- [Alex] Update Jira board with agreed sprint priorities by EOD Dec 2.
- [Jordan] Share auth rollout checklist doc before end of week.
- [Sam] Create spike ticket for monitoring improvements and estimate effort.

Decisions
- We will target auth changes for the next release window, not a hotfix.
- Dashboard layout changes will ship behind a feature flag."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_main_product_planning_calendar_export_2025_12_02",
      "name": "Calendar Export - Main Product Planning Meeting - 2025-12-02",
      "mimeType": "text/calendar",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-24T10:18:29-05:00",
      "content": "BEGIN:VCALENDAR
VERSION:2.0
PRODID:-//company.com//Calendar 1.0//EN
BEGIN:VEVENT
UID:cal_planning_meeting_1@company.com
DTSTAMP:20251124T151829Z
DTSTART:20251202T150000Z
DTEND:20251202T154500Z
SUMMARY:Main Product - Planning Meeting
DESCRIPTION:45-minute planning session to discuss Main Product progress and next steps.\n\nAgenda:\n- Review current milestone status\n- Prioritize work for the next sprint\n- Identify blockers and owners
LOCATION:Zoom
URL:https://zoom.us/j/92134567890
ATTENDEE;CN=Alex Smith:mailto:alex.smith@company.com
ATTENDEE;CN=Jordan Johnson:mailto:jordan.johnson@company.com
ATTENDEE;CN=Sam Williams:mailto:sam.williams@company.com
ORGANIZER;CN=Alex Smith:mailto:alex.smith@company.com
END:VEVENT
END:VCALENDAR"
    },
    {
      "id": "file_email_export_planning_invite_alex_2025_11_24",
      "name": "Email - Planning meeting for Main Product - next week (Alex to Jordan, Sam)",
      "mimeType": "message/rfc822",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-24T10:02:15-05:00",
      "content": "From: Alex Smith <alex.smith@company.com>
To: Jordan Johnson <jordan.johnson@company.com>, Sam Williams <sam.williams@company.com>
Subject: Planning meeting for Main Product - next week
Date: Mon, 24 Nov 2025 10:02:15 -0500

Hi Jordan and Sam,

I’d like to schedule a 45-minute planning meeting next week during working hours (9–6 ET) to go over Main Product progress and next steps.

I’m proposing Tuesday, December 2, 2025 from 10:00–10:45 AM Eastern. Can you both confirm that this time works for you?

Agenda:
- Review current Main Product milestone status
- Prioritize work for the next sprint
- Identify blockers and owners

Best,
Alex"
    },
    {
      "id": "file_email_export_planning_response_jordan_2025_11_24",
      "name": "Email - Re_ Planning meeting for Main Product - next week (Jordan response)",
      "mimeType": "message/rfc822",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-24T10:07:40-05:00",
      "content": "From: Jordan Johnson <jordan.johnson@company.com>
To: Alex Smith <alex.smith@company.com>
Cc: Sam Williams <sam.williams@company.com>
Subject: Re: Planning meeting for Main Product - next week
Date: Mon, 24 Nov 2025 10:07:40 -0500

Hey Alex,

Tuesday, December 2 from 10:00–10:45 AM ET works for me.

Thanks,
Jordan"
    },
    {
      "id": "file_email_export_planning_response_sam_2025_11_24",
      "name": "Email - Re_ Planning meeting for Main Product - next week (Sam response)",
      "mimeType": "message/rfc822",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-24T10:11:03-05:00",
      "content": "From: Sam Williams <sam.williams@company.com>
To: Alex Smith <alex.smith@company.com>
Cc: Jordan Johnson <jordan.johnson@company.com>
Subject: Re: Planning meeting for Main Product - next week
Date: Mon, 24 Nov 2025 10:11:03 -0500

Hi Alex,

That time works for me as well. I’ve got a code review at 11, so 10:00–10:45 AM ET on Dec 2 is perfect.

Sam"
    },
    {
      "id": "file_main_product_slack_announcement_export_2025_11_24",
      "name": "Slack export - #main-product - Planning meeting announcement (2025-11-24)",
      "mimeType": "text/plain",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-24T10:20:51-05:00",
      "content": "Channel: #main-product
Timestamp: 2025-11-24T10:20:51-05:00
From: Alex Smith (alex.smith@company.com)

Message:
FYI @Jordan @Sam I’ve put a Main Product planning meeting on the calendar for Tue Dec 2, 10:00–10:45 AM ET. Zoom link is in the invite."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_hr_benefits_enrollment_guide_2026",
      "name": "Benefits Open Enrollment Guide - 2026 Plan Year",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-20T08:30:00-05:00",
      "content": "Benefits Open Enrollment Guide - 2026

Overview
This guide walks through how to review and update your medical, dental, vision, and retirement elections for the 2026 plan year.

Key Dates
- Enrollment window: November 10 – December 3, 2025
- Deadline: Wednesday, December 3, 2025 at 5:00 PM ET

How to Enroll
1. Log into the HR portal: https://hr.company.com/benefits
2. Review your current elections.
3. Make changes as needed and click Submit.

Questions
- Email hr@company.com or post in #ask-hr."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_email_export_hr_benefits_reminder_2025_11_24",
      "name": "Email - Reminder_ Benefits open enrollment closes December 3",
      "mimeType": "message/rfc822",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-24T09:05:12-05:00",
      "content": "From: HR Team <hr@company.com>
To: alex.smith@company.com, jordan.johnson@company.com, sam.williams@company.com, taylor.brown@company.com
Subject: Reminder: Benefits open enrollment closes December 3
Date: Mon, 24 Nov 2025 09:05:12 -0500

Hello team,

This is a reminder that benefits open enrollment for 2026 will close on Wednesday, December 3, 2025 at 5:00 PM ET. Please review your medical, dental, vision, and retirement elections before the deadline.

To make changes, log into the HR portal: https://hr.company.com/benefits

If you have any questions, reply to this email or reach out in the #ask-hr Slack channel.

Best,
HR Team"
    },

    {
      "id": "file_code_review_summary_pr_482_auth_middleware",
      "name": "Code Review - PR 482 Refactor authentication middleware",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-24T13:15:00-05:00",
      "content": "Code Review Summary - PR #482
Title: Refactor authentication middleware
Repository: github.com/company/main-product
Author: jordan.johnson@company.com
Reviewer: sam.williams@company.com

Overview
This PR refactors the authentication middleware to improve clarity and error handling.

Key Comments
- Sam: "Looks good overall. Can you add a small unit test for the edge case where the token is expired but refresh is disabled?" (line 132)

Action Items
- [Jordan] Add unit test for expired token with refresh disabled.

Link to PR
https://github.com/company/main-product/pull/482"
    },
    {
      "id": "file_slack_export_it_help_vpn_incident_2025_11_24",

      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-24T14:05:31-05:00",
      "content": "Channel: #it-help

2025-11-24T14:02:09-05:00 - it.support@company.com:
Heads up: we’re investigating intermittent VPN connectivity issues affecting some remote users. If you’re having trouble connecting, please include your OS and approximate time of failure in this thread.

2025-11-24T14:05:31-05:00 - sam.williams@company.com:
Experiencing frequent disconnects since ~1:45 PM ET, macOS 14.1, using the standard VPN client."
    },
    {

      "content": "Channel: #random

2025-11-24T16:16:47-05:00 - taylor.brown@company.com:
Question for the coffee nerds: best local spot near the office that’s open past 5? Need a late afternoon caffeine run tomorrow.

2025-11-24T16:18:03-05:00 - alex.smith@company.com:
I like Brewline on 7th — they’re usually open until 7 PM and have solid Wi-Fi if you need to work there."

      "id": "file_email_export_customer_feedback_dashboard_layout_19384",
      "name": "Email - [Ticket #19384] Customer feedback on dashboard layout",
      "mimeType": "message/rfc822",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-24T11:48:37-05:00",
      "content": "From: Customer Support <support@company.com>
To: jordan.johnson@company.com, taylor.brown@company.com
Subject: [Ticket #19384] Customer feedback on dashboard layout
Date: Mon, 24 Nov 2025 11:48:37 -0500

Hi Product team,

We received the following customer feedback on the new dashboard layout:

"The new layout looks cleaner, but I find it harder to quickly compare metrics across projects because the cards are so tall. It would be nice to have a more compact view."

Can you review and let us know if this is already on the roadmap?

Best,
Customer Support"
    },
